author: tobrien
title: Fair Supply Chain in Ghana
description: Oligopolies that form within supply chain governance boards may dictate economically disadvantageous terms to smallholder farmers.
solution: Implement democratic governance models for managing trade documents such as Certificate of Origin, Certificate of Analysis, etc.
experience: Thought leaders in SCM works with experienced Cardano Developers (4) and an experienced team of Atala PRISM Pioneers and Plutus devs (5)
